thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Carl Zeiss Meditec Sees FY Adj EBIT Margin At 14-16 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Carl Zeiss Meditec Sees FY Adj EBIT Margin At 14-16 Pct
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Carl Zeiss Meditec AG:
* DGAP-NEWS: CARL ZEISS MEDITEC AG STARTS NEW FISCAL YEAR 2017/18 WITH SOLID REVENUE GROWTH
* Q1 ‍REVENUE INCREASED BY 5.3 PERCENT​ * Q1 ‍REVENUE 294.7 MILLION EUROS * ‍Q1 EBIT 38.9 MILLION EUROS * Q1 ‍ADJUSTED EBIT MARGIN 13.5 PERCENT * ‍OBJECTIVE FOR FISCAL YEAR 2017/18 CONTINUES TO BE TO GROW AT AT LEAST SAME RATE AS UNDERLYING MARKET​
* ‍EBIT MARGIN IS EXPECTED TO BE WITHIN RANGE ALSO FORECAST FOR MEDIUM TERM, OF 14 TO 16 PERCENT ON AN ADJUSTED BASIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
